channel.title: 562: Error Connecting
channel.description:
ok so my client loads up as normal but when i try to connect to local host it says error connecting.
the ip on my client is 127.0.0.1 (else it would say error connect_js5) so it must be my server?
help meh pl0x?

item.title: 562: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

check that when you run it, your using the right java while running both, if its not working try connecting it to your ip then which should work. Cheers

Read full topic
